body: What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. Wilt-Leaf Liege is put from the deck in the graveyard What is the expected output? What do you see instead? Wilt-Leaf Liege should stay in the graveyard, instead it is put on the battlefield. This should happen only when an effect controlled by the opponent makes you discard it from your hand. What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? magarena 1.40, win 7 If you are reporting a game play bug, please attach your game.log file. If you are reporting a crash, please attach both crash.log and game.log files (both files are found in the main game folder). Please provide any additional information below. I've omitted the log, since I've already searched for info there and found nothing. the first reference to Wilt-Leaf Liege in my log is when I first atacked with it
author: [Jericho....@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/103491237475970207715/)
title: Wilt-Leaf Liege enters the battlefield when milled

comments.body:
To clarify, Wilt-Leaf Liege is put in the graveyard from the battlefield and it comes back to the battlefield instead of staying in the graveyard. Is this what you meant?

**Status:** Accepted
comments.author: [melvinzh...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/108278210804167927868/)

comments.body:
This issue was closed by revision ee862b603987 .

**Status:** Fixed
comments.author: [melvinzh...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/108278210804167927868/)

content:
_From [Jericho....@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/103491237475970207715/) on August 19, 2013 16:11:57_

What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. Wilt-Leaf Liege is put from the deck in the graveyard What is the expected output? What do you see instead? Wilt-Leaf Liege should stay in the graveyard, instead it is put on the battlefield. This should happen only when an effect controlled by the opponent makes you discard it from your hand. What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? magarena 1.40, win 7 If you are reporting a game play bug, please attach your game.log file. If you are reporting a crash, please attach both crash.log and game.log files (both files are found in the main game folder). Please provide any additional information below. I've omitted the log, since I've already searched for info there and found nothing. the first reference to Wilt-Leaf Liege in my log is when I first atacked with it

_Original issue: http://code.google.com/p/magarena/issues/detail?id=388_
